name: The Perfect Table
description:
Create a complex table in minutes!


Provided is:

  • A standard table
  • A mutli-select table


Each table combines all the latest enhancements of auto-layout and is has the ability to:

  • Add rows
  • Add columns
  • Change column width
  • Change color of a row or cell
  • Have icons, e.g. checkboxes, inside cells, with text


Components have been set up so that swapping instances doesn't lead to text reverts.


Finally, there are row borders!!
